revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DHP-1320 |revision=A1 |upc=790069339219 |ean= |asin=B004JXVLM0 |price= |est_release_date=01/18/2011 |fcc_date=11/11/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, wireless router |fcc_id=KA2HP1320A1 |ic_id=4216A-HP1320A1 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.4 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7241 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=INT6400A1G |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EM2I-10G |fla1_num= |fla2=4 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=ProMOS |ram2_model=V54C3128164VCI6 |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8032 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=5C:D9:98 |oui_eth=5C:D9:98 }} '''PowerLine Wireless N Router''' :[http://www.dlink.com/dhp-1320 Product page]
This device is using an: *[[Atheros]] ([[Intellon]]) INT6400A1G PLC MAC/PHY, *[[Atheros]] ([[Intellon]]) INT1400 PLC AFE/LD, *[[Atheros]] AR8032 FE (10/100) PHY, to link with *[[Atheros]] AR7241 SoC.
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
===Marked boards=== *"DHP-1320A1", "Rev:A1", and "2010/9/30" is silkscreened on the board of a production unit. *"21514D1320A11A1", "DIG-1320A1", "Rev.:A0-2", and "2010/7/14" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'''Lelon''' capacitors are used on the router/PLC side of the board. :'''KXJ''' capacitors are used for the AC power section of the board.
